ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: I hate Shadows of Luclin and I don't even own it yet...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree the new graphics looks great.  I had bought the game when it first came out and the graphics were good for three years ago but the new ones the
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree the new graphics looks great. I had bought the game
when it first came out and the graphics were good for three years ago but
the new ones the have for SoL are cool. I also upgraded to a new system
when the game came out. My video drivers may not be WQHL (a direct x item)
but the graphics are still great and crisp. Nvidia hasn't come up with new
drivers since DEc 3 and I have those. Anyway the new expansion should be a
great success
